"Katana Super-Intensive Training!":
"Ah, you've come.
I've been waiting for you to arrive again.
We need to do more intensive katana training!
I've put together a really great intensive
training course. You can't be proud of your strength
without clearing this kind of difficult quest.
This one might even be impossible for me...
give it a try!

*Limited to katanas, clear at S Rank"
"カタナを超特訓しちゃうよ！"

"おっ、来たね。
まだかまだかと思いながら待ってたんだー。
カタナの特訓しなきゃだもん！
超すごい訓練用メニュー、考えたよ。
これくらい難しいのをクリアしないと
カタナの腕は自慢できないよー。
わたしも無理かもしれないけど……
がんばってみ？

※抜剣系限定、Sランククリア"
